actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Governmental Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 96-139.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H.R. 3879 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize additional appropriations for the Temporary Commission on Financial Oversight of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Governmental Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 96-139) Authorizes additional appropriations of $9,000,000 for fiscal year 1979 and $13,000,000 for fiscal year 1980 for the Temporary Commission on Financial Oversight of the District of Columbia, half of which shall be from funds in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, and half of which shall be from funds in the Treasury to the credit of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to authorize additional appropriations for the Temporary Commission on Financial Oversight of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
